<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4749) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4739)

</column>

---

You can take on the shape of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures. Add the shapes listed in dragon form to your untamed form list. Whenever you’re polymorphed into another form using untamed form, you gain resistance 5 to your choice of bludgeoning or poison.

<title level="2">Dragon Shape leads to...</title>
[Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4754), [True Shapeshifter](/Feats.aspx?ID=4767)
name: Dragon Shape
